mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, C.PRODUCT_QTY FROM MEMBER M, PRODUCT P, CART C WHERE M.MEMBER_IDX = C.MEMBER_IDX AND P.PRODUCT_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID AND M.MEMBER_IDX = #{MEMBER_IDX} ORDER BY MEMBER_IDX ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (member_idx, product_id, product_qty) VALUES(#{member_idx}, #{product_id}, #{product_qty})
mapper.update: update cart set product_qty = #{product_qty} where member_idx = #{member_idx} and product_name = #{product_name}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where member_idx = #{member_idx} and product_name = #{product_name}
mapper.update: update cart set product_qty = product_qty + #{product_qty} where member_idx = #{member_idx} and product_name = #{product_name}
